isis.stitle: TSI 02-12-16 - Procedure for containment of injector hold down snap rings during removal of fuel injector assembly.

subjectgroup.subject: Procedure for containment of injector hold down snap rings during removal of fuel injector assembly.

geninfo.para: During the removal process of injectors from a VT 365 engine, the ring retaining the bolt within the hold down assembly could fall off and find its way into the lube oil system. The following service procedure is intended to eliminate the possibility of a lost or broken piece of a snap ring entering the crankcase.

figure.caption: Figure 1. Injector Hold Down Clamp Assembly

step1.para: Prior to removing injector assembly, insert clean shop towels into oil drain holes adjacent to each glow plug. A thin screwdriver at least six inches in length can be used to position shop towels into the oil drain holes . This step will enable the recovery of a snap rings or pieces if they become dislodged during the injector removal process.

note.para: The shop cloth towels can be positioned without the removal of glow plugs and buss bar.
Repeat this procedure for each injector assembly.

figure.caption: Figure 2. Location of Oil Drain Hole to Glow Plug
Figure 3. Positioning Shop Towels into Oil Drain Holes with a Screwdriver

step1.para: Once the injector assembly has been removed from the engine, verify snap ring is in place on injector hold down bolt.

note.para: If snap ring or a piece of snap ring is missing from injector hold down assembly, it must be located prior to removing any shop towels.

caution.para: Failure to account for all snap rings and / or pieces prior to placing vehicle back in service can cause engine damage. A missing snap ring can be ingested into the lube oil system causing severe damage to internal engine components.

step1.para: Removal of the oil pan assembly will be necessary to recover missing snap ring(s) if not found under the valve cover. Once all snap rings are accounted for. shop towels can be pulled out.
Verify that all oil drain holes are clear before installing valve cover.

note.para: This procedure must be followed for any injector assembly that is being removed for service or replacement.
